verses.1: “Ngun a kitawh khiatna a khuk om a, kham a kisiansakna a mun mah om hi.
verses.2: Mihingte in lei sung panin sik to khia a, suang sung panin sumsan a huantui uh hi.
verses.3: Mihingte in khuamial thuk pen sung zongin, lei sung a thukpi dong hahkatin zong uh a, khuamial thuk tawng sung pan suang a to khia uh hi.
verses.4: Mihingteʼ teenna panin a gamlapi mun, kuamah a pai ngei lohna sungah lei sung sumte a to khia uh hi. Tua lai munah amau guak in na semsem uh a, lei thuk sungah khauhual tawh kivei suk kivei to uh hi.
verses.5: I annek dingte leitungah hong po khia a, ahi zongin leinuai thuk sung mei bangin a sa mahmah hi.
verses.6: Lei sunga om suangte sungah sapfaia suangmanpha om a, a leivuite sungah kham a om hi.
verses.7: Simbung in zong tua lampi thei ngei lo a, luimu zong tua lai ah va leng ngei lo hi.
verses.8: Humpinelkai ahi a, ganhing dangte ahi zongin cikmah hunin tua lai ah va pai ngei lo uh hi.
verses.9: “Mihingte in suang a sak pente to uh a, mualteʼ bul lei sung panin a to khia uh hi.
verses.10: Suangte a tawhvang uh ciangin suang manphate a mu uh hi.
verses.11: Amaute in tuinak kipatna dong lei sung to uh a, a kiphum cip nate hong suah khia uh hi.
verses.12: Ahi zongin koi lai ah pilna kimu ding ahi hiam? Koi lai ah thutheihna nak om ahi hiam?
verses.13: “Mihingte in a kimuh nading a lampi thei lo uh a, mihingteʼ gam sungah zong a lampi om lo hi.
verses.14: A thuk mahmah tuipi liante in, ‘Koʼ sungah om lo hi,’ ci uh a, tuipite in, ‘Ko kiangah om lo hi,’ a ci uh hi.
verses.15: Pilna pen kham tawh a kilei zo hi lo a, a man ding zah zong ngun tawh seh theih hi lo hi.
verses.16: Ofir kham tawh pilna a kilei zo hi lo a, suangmanpha pen tawh zong a kilei zo hi tuan lo hi.
verses.17: Pilna a manphatna kham le limlang tawh tehtheih hi lo a, kham hoih pen a kibawl nate tawh zong lei zawh hi lo hi.
verses.18: Pilna a manphatna suangkhi le limlang tawh genteh theih hi lo a, pilna them khat bek nangawn kep sangin manpha zaw lai hi.
verses.19: Ethiopia gamah a piang topaz suang manphate tawh tehtheih ding hi lo a, kham citak hoih pen tawh zong kiteh thei tuan lo hi.
verses.20: “Tua ahihleh koi lai panin pilna hong piang ahi hiam? Thutheihna koi lai ah om ahi hiam?
verses.21: Nuntakna a nei sung pan a mu thei kuamah om lo a, a leeng thei vasate nangawn in mu thei lo uh hi.
verses.22: Sihna le siatna nangawn in a thu hem zak bek ung, ci lai uh hi.
verses.23: “Pasian bek in pilna lampi thei a, amah bek in a omna mun a thei hi.
verses.24: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in leimong dong mu a, vantung nuai ah a om na khempeuh a mu thei hi.
verses.25: Pasian in huih a gik ding zah bawlin, tuipi a liat nading zah a seh laitak,
verses.26: guahzukna ding mun thu pia-in, khuaphialep in a zuih ding lampi bawlin a vaihawm laitak nangawnin,
verses.27: amah in pilna mu-in a manphate en tel a, amah in hoih sa ahih manin a kipsak hi.
verses.28: “Tua ciangin amah in mihingte tungah thu genin, ‘Topa zahtakna, pilna hi a, siatna pelhna pen thutheihna hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
